name: Misty Terrain
description: You cover the ground in a thin, healing mist that surrounds a 120 foot circle, centered on you. For 3 turns, no grounded creatures inside the mist can suffer from new status conditions. Grounded creatures are those that do not have a flying speed or Levitate, Magnet Rise, or similar ability. In addition, grounded creatures in the terrain are resistant to dragon-type damage, or if they were vulnerable to dragon-type damage, they take regular damage instead.

contest.effect: Excites the audience a lot if used first.
